abstract.t: This document specifies a ROHC (Robust Header Compression) profile for header compression of packets using the legacy header compression schemes defined by IP compression (RFC 2507), CRTP (RFC 2508), and ECRTP (RFC 3545). The profile, called ROHC-CRTP, enables the use of these legacy header compression schemes in the context of a ROHC channel, making use of the mechanisms offered by the ROHC framework.
